element.name: Procedures Permitted by the State
element.definition: A list of all of the procedures permitted by the EMS Agency's licensing state based on ICD-10 Procedure Codes.
element.v3Comment:
This data element should capture all of the procedures permitted by the state for any/all levels of EMS personnel in the state. This is associated with each of the states (dAgency.04). This is related to the EMS Agency's procedures (dConfiguration.07) which have been implemented within the EMS System.
State EMS systems which have regulatory authority to determine the procedures statewide may identify ICD-10 PCS procedure codes based on medical direction and their own need.
Code list is represented in ICD-10-PCS: Procedure Codes, see suggested NEMSIS list of procedure codes.
ICD-10-PCS
Website - http://uts.nlm.nih.gov
Product - UMLS Metathesaurus
